articles.content: Much like the Bollywood original, Nenjuku Needhi turns oppression into spectacle and denies dignity to the very people it claims to represent.Since Nenjuku Needhi is a remake of the Anubhav Sinha dir… [+5858 chars]

articles.title: Jack N Jill review: A complete dud of a reel attempt - Onmanorama
articles.description: Pitched as a science fiction, Jack N Jill has neither science nor fiction or a trace of humour in two hours of reel show.
articles.content:
